title: Veterans Health Administration COVID-19 (VACO) Index for COVID-19 Mortality
desc: The Veterans Health Administration COVID-19 (VACO) Index for COVID-19 Mortality estimates risk of 30-day mortality after COVID-19 infection using pre-COVID health status.

orgreference.text: King JT Jr, Yoon JS, Rentsch CT, Tate JP, Park LS, Kidwai-Khan F, Skanderson M, Hauser RG, Jacobson DA, Erdos J, Cho K, Ramoni R, Gagnon DR, Justice AC. Development and validation of a 30-day mortality index based on pre-existing medical administrative data from 13,323 COVID-19 patients: The Veterans Health Administration COVID-19 (VACO) Index. PLoS One. 2020 Nov 11;15(11):e0241825.

data.evidence:
Coefficientsum = Agecoefficient + Sexcoeffient + CCI_Agecoefficient + MI_PVDcoefficient + Constantcoefficient

ORcalc = exp(coefficientsum)

Riskpred  = ORcalc / (1 + ORcalc)

Interpretation:

Risk Risk Category
0-8.7% Lower risk (lower 50% of scores)
8.8-16.0% Moderate risk (4th sextile of scores)
16.1-21.2% High risk (5th sextile of scores)
>21.3% Extreme risk (upper sextile of scores)
data.facts: From King 2020.
